outline.text: Mission Statement: To provide PTHSD high school students with the opportunity to concentrate their studies, beyond those required in high school, in the areas of science, technology, engineering, and mathematics, and expose students to relevant real world experiences through project work, conferences and presentations to enhance their high school experience.
• Cultivate transferable work habits such as perseverance, goal setting, and self-direction.
• Expose students to potential career opportunities in the field. • Encourage students to pursue higher education and major in STEM careers.
• Inspire keen interest in mathematics, science, engineering, and technology, develop strong scholarship in the subject and promote the enjoyment of these studies in high school.
• Promote interactions with STEM professionals to learn about future opportunities.
• Signal to employers, universities, training programs, and military that a student has completed a comprehensive course of study in a specialized area.
• Support field experiences connected to the world outside of the school building.
